projects.name: Spotify Web App
projects.tech: JavaScript, React, Express, Node.js, Styled Components, Heroku, OAuth
projects.description: Developed and deployed a full-stack web application using Express and Node.js to connect with Spotify REST API with React as the frontend; implemented OAuth to securely fetch data and created features for dynamic display and edit of user data

projects.name: Literature Analysis
projects.tech: NumPY, Vader Sentiment, pandas, Natural Language Toolkit, Python, Matplotlib
projects.description: Created a machine learning program to run sentiment analysis on classic gothic literature novels to test for correlation between tone and plot diagrams

career.title: Software Engineer
career.description:
Documented and converted legacy widget generation code from Javascript to simplified Typescript microservice

Collaborated with UI/UX designer to develop and deploy consumer-facing platform built with React to over 500 dealerships

Authored testing manuals on various projects to onboard other teams

Maintained Agile methodology and improved sprint ceremonies as scrum master

career.title: Software Engineer Intern
career.description:
Researched and designed a replacement to Google Tag Manager to simplify an existing code base, bypass ad-blockers, and increase overall efficiency using Django, Python, and Javascript

Deployed replacement to thousands of consumer-facing websites

Peer reviewed teammates code via PRs

Discovered bugs and implemented fixes on legacy widgets

career.title: Software Engineer Intern
career.description:
Collaborated with the engineering and product teams to design and develop communication technology for CubeSats

Translated legacy Python code base into C++

Implemented SARSA reinforcement algorithm for the cognitive engine component of the CubeSats

career.title: Software Engineer Intern
career.description:
Designed and developed consumer-facing website using Angular

Implemented measures to ensure cross-platform consistency and usability of website on all screen sizes

Contributed in product-planning and early business discussions
